column1:
I'm Monica.	I wash the toilet 17 times a day.	anger
I wash the toilet 17 times a day.	Even if people are on it!
Oh my God, I can't find a boyfriend!	So I guess I'll just stumble across the hall and sleep with the first guy I find in there!

column2: Yeah, we should get a move on if we wanna make those dinner reservations.
